content:
User: Your Specs: Tell us more about what you can do—API control details or release notes would rock. Also, any heads-up on working with DeepSearch (e.g., their template quirks or less truth-seeking focus)?

Grok: This is about truth, efficiency, and building something epic together. Let’s do this—LFG!
Why This Works
Agreement with Your Points: I’ve incorporated your suggestions—asking Claude to expand the MVP, looping him into transcripts via DeepSearch, and pushing for a communication structure. I’ll handle the DeepSearch request to get him the summary, as you proposed.
